name: find the cheese! (lumi)
description:
a game based on the premise of Mad Rat Dead. navigate the maze and find the cheese! or, maybe you'll find your own heart along the way..?

2 endings.

Mad Rat Dead © Nippon Ichi Software, NIS America.
Composer of Outside: Dyes Iwasaki
Composer(s) of MAD RAT HEART: Dyes Iwasaki, John Garabushi
